metadata.title: CVE-2024-35943 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:pmdomain: ti: Add a null pointer check to the omap_prm_domain_initdevm_kasprintf() returns a pointer to dynamically allocated memorywhich can be NULL upon failure. Ensure the allocation was successfulby checking the pointer validity.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
